data.name: Stellar Stars - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Stellar Stars Soundtrack includes hits from all over the game and of course the Official Stellar Stars Theme Song - Star Hunter!

This sound of Stellar Stars is born from the galactic shine of the cosmic stars of awesomeness! Whether you are listening to some tunes while going on a stellar adventure, or need some rhythm to hype up your online battles – the Stellar Stars soundtrack is right beside you.

The Stellar Stars soundtrack contains all in-game music and is updated whenever new characters or in-game music are added to Stellar Stars.

Special Highlights:


1) Stellar Stars Main Theme - Star Hunter (Retro Version)
2) Stellar Stars Main Theme - Star Hunter
3) Underground Caverns
4) Darkness Fight
5) Frozen Wasteland
6) Ice Guardian
7) Robotic Labs
8) Mr Robot
9) Legendary Coliseum
10) Awareness

data.short_description: The official soundtrack of Stellar Stars - born from the cosmic stars of awesomeness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 256MB, or Intel GMA 950 or newer
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 256MB, or Intel GMA 950 or newer
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA Videocard with at least 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 256MB, or Intel GMA 950 or newer
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
